Description: Unique identifier for each Pixar film, in order of release
Duration of the film in minutes
Official film rating (e.g., G, PG, PG-13)
Short summary of the film’s story
Role of the person (e.g., director, producer)
Genre or Subgenre type (e.g., Animation, Adventure)
Box office earnings in the US and Canada
Box office earnings outside the US and Canada
Number of reviews on Rotten Tomatoes
Number of user ratings on IMDb
Type of Academy Award (e.g., Best Animated Feature)
Status of the award (e.g., won, nominated)
